presentation.descriptionLine1: Junior Full Stack Developer specialized in Data Science.
presentation.descriptionLine2: I design modern, efficient, data-driven web applications.
presentation.descriptionLine3: With my dual skill set in development and data analysis, I create innovative solutions that turn information into value.
presentation.aboutText: Passionate about development and data science, I combine both worlds to build innovative solutions. I’m always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

card1.title: Web Development
card1.description: Creating responsive websites and web apps using modern frameworks.

card2.title: Data Science
card2.description: Data exploration and visualization, predictive modeling, advanced statistical analysis.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some recent projects from my training in Data Science and Analytics.

list.title: GP Colis
list.description: GP Colis is a web application dedicated to managing and posting parcel transport ads between Senegal and France.

list.title: Pokédex React
list.description: Interactive Pokédex built with React and local JSON. Allows you to view, search, add, and delete Pokémon entries easily.

list.title: Olympics Data Analysis
list.description: Complete data analysis app for Olympics (1896–2022). Interactive visualizations to explore trends by sport, season, and country.

list.title: ML Projects Hub – Classification & Clustering
list.description: Collection of real-world ML projects: wine quality classification, K-Means clustering, fish species grouping. Over 8 models tested including Random Forest, SVM, Extra Trees with detailed analysis and visuals.

list.title: SocialTweet – Smart Social Network
list.description: Twitter-like social network with auth, feeds, likes, replies, and favorites. BERT-based AI analyzes tweets for emotion and recommends tailored suggestions.

list.title: Deep Learning Hub – Advanced Projects
list.description: Deep Learning projects including MLP (99.8% accuracy), CNN (99.4% MNIST, 78% CIFAR-10), LSTM, DQN, PPO. Applications in classification, vision, and reinforcement learning.
